alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 1:24PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Coffee County through 215 PM CDT... At 124 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Ariton to 7 miles northwest of Elba. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elba, Fort Rucker, New Brockton, Lee, Pine Level, Java, Richburg, Mixons Crossroads, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Victoria, Danleys Crossroads, Eanon, Lowry Mill, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Tabernacle, Arcus and Woodland Grove Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
